description: 100-question quiz covering ALM concepts and Codebeamer fundamentals (trackers, requirements, test management, traceability, views, reporting, and wiki dashboards).

questions.text: Which statement best aligns with ALM in Codebeamer? (variant 1)
options: ALM manages the full product lifecycle with traceability
